type_assignment_errors.description: Type mismatch issues where values don't match expected types
examples: Type '"basic"' is not comparable to type 'SubscriptionTier'
Type 'string' is not assignable to type 'number'
Type 'User | null' is not assignable to parameter of type 'User'

missing_properties_errors.description: Object properties that don't exist on types or missing required properties
examples: Property 'nuclearChallenges' does not exist on type 'Alarm'
Property 'personalization' is missing in type ... but required in type 'UserPreferences'
Property 'h7' does not exist on type 'JSX.IntrinsicElements'

module_import_errors.description: Missing or incorrect module imports and exports
examples: Module '"../hooks/useMobileTouch"' has no exported member 'useMobileTouch'
Cannot find module '../services/sound'
Module '"lucide-react"' has no exported member 'Explosion'

function_signature_errors.description: Function calls with wrong argument counts or types
examples: Expected 1 arguments, but got 0
Type '() => void' is not assignable to type '() => Promise<void>'
Argument of type 'unknown' is not assignable to parameter of type 'Error'

object_literal_errors.description: Invalid properties in object literals or excess properties
examples: Object literal may only specify known properties, and 'ringColor' does not exist
Object literal may only specify known properties, and 'photos' does not exist
Object literal may only specify known properties, and 'wakeWindow' does not exist
Cannot find name 'completedChallenges'
Cannot find name 'activeChallenges'

duplicate_identifier_errors.description: Variables or types declared multiple times
examples: Duplicate identifier 'vi'
Individual declarations in merged declaration 'NuclearModeChallenge' must be all exported or all local
No overload matches this call (forwardRef issues)
Property 'title' does not exist on Lucide icon props
Type 'RefObject<HTMLElement | null>' is not assignable to type 'Ref<HTMLButtonElement>'
'alarms' is possibly 'undefined'
Type 'undefined' is not assignable to type 'SetStateAction<Date | null>'
'error' is of type 'unknown'

immediate_automated_fixes: Run ESLint --fix to auto-correct formatting issues
Run Prettier --write to normalize indentation and spacing
Apply regex fixes for common string literal issues
manual_fixes_required: Fix type definitions for SubscriptionTier enum/type
Add missing properties to interface definitions
Fix import paths and ensure exported members exist
Fix React component prop type mismatches
